Name: Oh Gosh!
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A subtley orange twist on a classic Daiquiri .
History: Created by Tony Conigliaro in 2001 at Isola, London, England. A customer requested a Daiquiri with a difference - when this was served he took one sip and exclaimed "Oh Gosh!".
Nutrition: One serving of Oh Gosh! contains 191 calories
